title: Gluten Free Country Drop Biscuits
directions: Measure the PG GF Flax AP flour, baking powder and salt medium bowl and whisk together.
Cut in shortening with pastry blender till it resembles coarse cornmeal.
Make a well in the center of the flour mixture, add all of the milk at one time and stir with a fork until no flour shows and a soft dough forms.
Drop tablespoons of the dough on an ungreased baking sheet.
Put the baking sheet on the center rack of the oven.
Bake until biscuits are brown about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups Premium Gold® Gluten Free Flax & Ancient Grains All-Purpose Flour
¼ cup shortening or soft butter
1 cup milk (a little more may be needed for right consistency)
